body_html:
@dchatterjee172

I have been working on some updates on this library recently and rethinking your suggestion. In the examples you have in mind, what is the intended output?
Is it [batch_size, self._output_dim] or [batch_size, x, self._output_dim]?

Or are you suggesting the method internally reshapes [batch_size, x, self._input_dim] (rank 3) tensors to [batch_size, x * self._input_dim] (rank 2)?

For the former, I need to think more as to what explicit feature maps (with random Fourier features) mean in that case. The latter is tricky. It is better if the user reshapes before calling the map method.

Thanks for clarifying
